channel.title: Void walkable?

item.title: Void walkable?
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Find the actual Interface ID for what is bieng displayed, not for the lines, and if you have the method called “setWalkableInterface(int ID)”, than call it in your main class (Client) server sided upon the startup method “init()”:

public void init() {
setWalkableInterface(11891);
}

Hope it helps somewhat, believe that method is Pi+

Read full topic

item.title: Void walkable?
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

how do i keep this void in my chatbox as i walk around? whenever i walk it goes away.

public void startMessage() { sendFrame126("@blu@ Getting started", 11893); sendFrame126(" To start the tutorial use your left mouse button to click on the", 11894); sendFrame126(" 'Runescape Guide' in this room. He is indicated by a flashing", 11895); sendFrame126(" yellow arrow above his head. If you can't see him, use your", 11896); sendFrame126(" keyboard's arrow keys to rotate the view.", 11897); createArrow(1, 1); sendFrame164(11891); }

Read full topic
